data.name: AtlasAlreadyHasRegion
data.value: Texture atlas already has a region named '{0}'.

data.name: ModelNoVertexIndices
data.value: No indices were provided for the vertex data.

data.name: ZoomSpeedCannotBeNegative
data.value: Zoom speed cannot be negative.

data.name: MinimumZoomCannotBeZeroOrLess
data.value: Minimum amount of zoom must be greater than zero.

data.name: MaximumZoomCannotBeZeroOrLess
data.value: Maximum amount of zoom must be greater than zero.

data.name: ElementOutsideQuadtreeBounds
data.value: The specified element is outside this quadtree's boundaries.

data.name: LabelNoFont
data.value: Label control requires a font to be set in order to draw text.

data.name: ColorBadHexString
data.value: Hex code string was not recognized as a valid Color.

data.name: UninitializedGraphicsDevice
data.value: Graphics device has not been initialized yet.

data.name: NoInputHandler
data.value: Control cannot process input without an input handler.

data.name: GridColumnOutOfRange
data.value: Specified column is outside the range of this grid's columns.

data.name: GridRowOutOfRange
data.value: Specified row is outside the range of this grid's rows.

data.name: EffectMissingResource
data.value: Missing expected effect resource '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidScrollRegionDirection
data.value: Invalid movement direction for scrolling region.

data.name: SheetAlreadyHasAnimation
data.value: Sprite sheet already has an animation with the specified name.

data.name: SheetNoFramesForAnimation
data.value: Sprite sheet contains no frames for the specified animation.

data.name: ControlNotSelfRecurring
data.value: Derived control class must pass itself as the generic self-recurring type parameter.

data.name: StyleSetterNotMemberAccess
data.value: Setter expression for style must access a control's property.

data.name: StyleSetterNonPropertyAccess
data.value: Setter expression for style can only target properties and no other member types.

data.name: StyleSetterNonLocalProperty
data.value: Setter expression targets a property not belonging to the control type being styled.

data.name: TileHasNoTexture
data.value: Tile set is not based on a single image and the specified tile lacks a texture.

data.name: TileSetAlreadyHasTile
data.value: A tile with the same ID of '{0}' already exists in this tile set.

data.name: TileSetMissingTile
data.value: No configured data for the specified tile could be found.
